channel.title: How to make a client questions..HELP PLEASE!
channel.description: Okay I'm making a client and i made the picture on paint (im using butter's dream client 5.05) and half of the picture is right and the other half needs like flipped. How do I get this correct? is there a way i can flip on side? Thanks!
